Since 2007, we've been providing agile development for a whole host of clients, ranging from small startups to established teams. Along the way, we've built several great web applications for our clients, developed some juicy apps of our own, taught workshops, organized really cool events (Railscamps, Nodecamp etc.), and met a bunch of great people.  Our work flow follows the principles of agile software development, which includes daily calls, honest retrospectives, and a story-driven planning process. We work closely with our clients to deliver awesome web applications. But see for yourself...
Have a project we can help bring to life? We're ready for service: team@railslove.com
